channel.title: backup on dvoros.com
channel.description: Recent content in backup on dvoros.com

item.title: Saving endangered YouTube videos
item.description: Remember that video that you thought was funny ten years ago but didn’t age well enough to stay on YouTube? I do too and I hate that I can’t find it anymore! To avoid this from happening again, I’ve decided to save my favorites to a playlist and regularly back it up. I have a short shell script cron’d to run every morning on a Scaleway server that saves new additions to Object Storage.
